content.question: Which of the following statements concerning the relationship between the three empires shown on the map is most accurate?

choices.label: They are the same empire with three names to represent the stages of development.
They each reached their height at different times and expanded from the decline of the previous empire.
All three formed a formidable triple alliance that allowed them to control the region from about 600 to 1600 CE.
The presence of the three political entities in one area of Africa destabilized the region, allowing for conquest by European enslavers.

content.answer: They each reached their height at different times and expanded from the decline of the previous empire.
